alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:17PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA... SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON AND NORTHWESTERN BENNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM MDT... At 1016 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles south of Snake Butte, or 17 miles northwest of Martin, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Oglala Lakota, southwestern Jackson and northwestern Bennett Counties, including the following locations... Hisle and the Pine Ridge Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
